name: scanservjs
description: scanservjs is a simple web-based UI for SANE which allows you to share a scanner on a network without the need for drivers or complicated installation.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build --workspace=packages/client --workspace=packages/server
scripts.verify: npm run version && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.docker-build: npm run verify && docker build -t scanservjs-image .
scripts.release: npm run verify && npm run build && npm run package

author: Sam Strachan
